remarks: The subfactorial converges rapidly to ` N ! / _e ` .  This is part of Metamath 100 proof #88.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Jan-2015.)
statement:
derang.d $e |- D = ( x e. Fin |-> ( # ` { f | ( f : x -1-1-onto-> x /\ A. y e. x ( f ` y ) =/= y ) } ) ) $.
subfac.n $e |- S = ( n e. NN0 |-> ( D ` ( 1 ... n ) ) ) $.
subfaclim $p |- ( N e. NN -> ( abs ` ( ( ( ! ` N ) / _e ) - ( S ` N ) ) ) < ( 1 / N ) ) $.
$d D n $.
$d N f n x y $.
$d S n x y $.
